metadata.title: CVE-2020-12823 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: OpenConnect 8.09 has a buffer overflow, causing a denial of service(application crash) or possibly unspecified other impact, via craftedcertificate data to get_cert_name in gnutls.c.

criterions.comment: openconnect: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
